page.title: 11Hazel's Family Life
page.content: Mum,my brother and I get up at 7.30.Dad and Grandma get up at 7.50.John,Grandma and I have breakfast while Dad and Mum get ready for work.When John and I have had breakfast we get ready for school.John goes to Harry Carlton Comp.I go to Costock C of E Primary.Mum works at B.P.B.Instruments as an Accounts Clerk and Dad works at British Gypsum as a Fitter/Welder.Grandma stays at home with our dog,Bessie.Grandma takes Bessie for walks at 8.45,1.40 and 3.30.When Grandma takes Bessie for a walk at 3.30 I meet her from school and we walk back home.My brother comes home at 4.20.We have a drink of tea and biscuits.Mum and Dad come home at 5.00.We have tea at 7.30.I then go to the pub and get some sweets and return to watch T.V. until 9.30.then John and I go to bed.
